dashboard.label: Plex Monitoring
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=plex sourcetype="plex:devices"
| timechart dc(id) as "# of Registered Devices"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=plex sourcetype="plex:devices"
| dedup createdAt id name platform
| sort - createdAt
| eval createdAt=strftime(createdAt, "%a %B %d %Y %H:%M:%S")
| rename createdAt AS "Created Timestamp", id AS "ID", name AS "Device Name", platform AS "Device Platform"
 | table "Created Timestamp", ID, "Device Name", "Device Platform"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}}},"visualizations":{"viz_single_1":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"none","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"title":"Registered Devices"},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":100,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Registered Devices"}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{},"structure":[{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":150}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":150,"w":1200,"h":571}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"Plex Monitoring","description":"Dashboard for monitoring Plex.","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}}}
